<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Evaluation Scenario Score Router"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/human-evaluations/evaluation_scenario/{evaluation_scenario_id}/score"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Fetch the score of a specific evaluation scenario.

Args:
    evaluation_scenario_id: The ID of the evaluation scenario to fetch.

Returns:
    Dictionary containing the scenario ID and its score.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"evaluation_scenario_id","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","title":"Evaluation Scenario Id"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
